publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2905 Margo MacDonald: The Chronicle of the Kings of Alba—That the Parliament congratulates Neil Oliver for his work on the Chronicle of the Kings of Alba, held since the 17th century in the national library of France, the Bibliothèque nationale de France, and resolves to request the return, on loan, of this unique document for Homecoming Scotland 2009 in view of its relevance to the history and identity of Scotland.
S3M-2905 The Chronicle of the Kings of Alba (lodged on 17 November 2008) Jamie Hepburn*, Alex Neil*

S3M-2905 Margo MacDonald: The Chronicle of the Kings of Alba—That the Parliament congratulates Neil Oliver for his work on the Chronicle of the Kings of Alba, held since the 17th century in the national library of France, the Bibliothèque nationale de France, and resolves to request the return, on loan, of this unique document for Homecoming Scotland 2009 in view of its relevance to the history and identity of Scotland. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Alex Neil, Michael Matheson*
